name: pic-to-jigsaw
description: An interactive jigsaw puzzle web application that creates puzzles from uploaded images

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/css dist/js && cp index.html _headers dist/ && cp css/styles.css dist/css/ && cp js/app.js dist/js/ && sed -i.bak '/<script src="js\/iframe-highlight.js"><\/script>/d' dist/index.html && rm dist/index.html.bak
scripts.build:all: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/css dist/js && cp index.html _headers dist/ && cp css/styles.css dist/css/ && cp js/*.js dist/js/
